solution_line_template: The lion and tiger's daily consumption of meat is {lion_consumption} + {tiger_consumption} = <<{lion_consumption}+{tiger_consumption}={total_daily_consumption}>>{total_daily_consumption} kilograms.
Therefore, their supply of meat will last for {total_meat_supply}/{total_daily_consumption}= <<{total_meat_supply}/{total_daily_consumption}={days_meat_will_last}>>{days_meat_will_last} days.
